channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. stock futures rally after Trump delays E.U. tariff deadline
France, Vietnam sign Airbus, satellite deals as Macron visits Hanoi
item.description: France and Vietnam signed a deal on Monday for 20 Airbus planes, among other pacts, as President Emmanuel Macron visited Hanoi.

item.title: Trump considers redirecting $3 billion in Harvard grants to U.S. trade schools
item.description: President Donald Trump said he is considering taking $3 billion of previously awarded grant money for research away from Harvard and giving it to trad...

item.title: Trump delays 50% tariffs on EU to July 9
item.description: President of the European Commission Ursula Von der Leyen said that she had a "good call" with Trump, but needed until July 9 to "reach a good deal."

item.title: Sen. Ron Johnson says there are 'enough' GOP senators to stall House budget bill
item.description: The Republican lawmakers' concerns underscore the potentially difficult path ahead for the sweeping domestic policy package.

item.title: House Speaker Johnson downplays deficit concerns as budget bill faces skeptics in Senate
item.description: Speaker Mike Johnson rejected concerns that the "big, beautiful bill" will add to the federal deficit.

item.title: Why wealth rarely survives grandchildren — and how your family can beat the odds
Rising bond yields give stock-market investors the yips. Watch these levels.
Apple has been the worst Big Tech stock lately. What investors are missing.
Ship crossings to the U.S. are being canceled. Trump’s latest threat won’t help.
